description:
This modules defines a set of functions for managing indexes that are declared in the prolog of a module.

This module is part of Zorba's XQuery Data Definition Facility. All the indexes managed by this module have to be pre-declared in the prolog of a module. Please refer to the general documentation for more information and examples.
authors: <xqdoc:author xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">Nicolae Brinza, Matthias Brantner, David Graf, Till Westmann, Markos Zaharioudakis</xqdoc:author>

returns.description: A sequence of QNames, one for each available index, or an empty sequence if none are.

functions.name: create

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the index to create.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, creates the index with the given name.

errors: zerr:ZDDY0021 if $name is not equal to the name of any resource in the statically known indexes.
zerr:ZDDY0022 if an index with $name already exists.

functions.name: declared-indexes
functions.description:
Gets a sequence of QNames representing the indexes that have been declared
 in the prolog of the static context.
functions.summary: Gets a sequence of QNames representing the indexes that have been declared in the prolog of the static context.

returns.description: A sequence of QNames, one for each created collection, or an emtpy sequence.

functions.name: delete

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the index to delete.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, deletes the index with the given name.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0009 if the index does not exist.</xqdoc:error>

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the index that is being checked.

returns.description: true if the index is available; false otherwise.

functions.name: is-declared-index
functions.description: Gets whether an index has been declared in the prolog of the static context.
functions.summary: Gets whether an index has been declared in the prolog of the static context.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the index that is being checked.

returns.description: true if the index was declared; false otherwise.
